name: open-diabetes-filter
description: Allows programming OpenDiabetesFilters using Google Blockly

docker.title: Use Docker
docker.description: Use Docker for filter execution and plot generation. Docker images `plotteria` and `odv` need to be installed manually.

docker-cleanup.title: Remove Docker containers after exection
docker-cleanup.description: Remove Docker containers after they finished executing.

docker-remote.title: Use Remote Docker
docker-remote.description: Use a remote Docker instance. Specify host and port below.

docker-host.title: Remote Docker Host
docker-host.description: Protocol and host of your docker daemon.

cli-native.title: Use built-in ODV CLI
cli-native.description: Not used if you are using Docker. Use the built-in OpenDiabetesVault command line interface.

cli-custom.title: Custom ODV CLI
cli-custom.description: Not used if you are using Docker. Path to your OpenDiabetesVault command line interface executable.

cli-precompile.title: Filter compilation
cli-precompile.description: If enabled filter processes will be compiled, using the compile command below, before being passed to the CLI.

plot-native.title: Use built-in plot generator
plot-native.description: Not used if you are using Docker. Use the built-in plot generator.

plot-custom.title: Plot generator
plot-custom.description: Not used if you are using Docker. Path to your plot executable.

commands.title: Commands
commands.description:
Commands are executed in Docker if enabled, or on your system.
The variable `cli` will be substituted with the corresponding path to the ODV CLI executable.

version.title: CLI version
version.description: Used to check the version of your command line interface.

init.title: ODV repository init
init.description: Used to initialize an ODV repository.

listtags.title: ODV tag list
listtags.description: Used to get all tags of the current ODV repository.

import.title: ODV data import
import.description:
Used to import data into your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type
`files`: files to import

export.title: ODV data export
export.description:
Used to export all data from your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type

exporttagged.title: ODV data export (tagged)
exporttagged.description:
Used to export data with the given tag from your ODV repository.
**Arguments:**
`type`: import type
`tag`: input tag

compile.title: ODV filter compilation
compile.description:
Used to compile ODV filter classes before execution
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container

process.title: ODV filter process
process.description:
Used to execute filters.
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container
`out`: tag used for results

processtagged.title: ODV filter process
processtagged.description:
Used to execute filters.
**Arguments:**
`file`: relative path to process container
`in`: tag used for input
`out`: tag used for results

plotversion.title: Plot version
plotversion.description:
Used to check the version of the plot executable.
**Arguments:**
`plot`: path to your plot executable

plot.title: Plot generation
plot.description:
Used to generate plots from data.
**Arguments:**
`plot`: path to your plot executable
`file`: path to the data file
`out`: path to output directory
